attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: replace the road fund licence by placing this on Fuel at the point of sale,so all who drive pay.( 2p to 5p should possible cover this.)  Replace the "Tax Disk" on cars with a MOT Disk and take away the MOT Certificate as we know it.This keeps a control and visabilty that all cars have a valid MOT.
